definition: to be strongly attached to/to be dedicated/to cling to
aspect particle indicating action in progress
to make known/to show/to prove/to write/book/outstanding
to touch/to come in contact with/to feel/to be affected by/to catch fire/to burn/(coll.) to fall asleep/(after a verb) hitting the mark/succeeding in

sentences.english: Dipa Ma challenged students belief in and attachment to their stories.
sentences.chinese: 蒂帕嬤挑戰那些信任並且執著他們的故事的學生。

sentences.english: "Innovative, brave in exploitation" is our persistent pursuit.
sentences.chinese: “敢於創新，勇於開拓”是我執著的追求。

sentences.english: Her persistence and enthusiasm have helped the group to achieve its status as an international development agency.
sentences.chinese: 她的執著和熱情幫助集團贏得了國際開發商的地位。

sentences.english: In short, the five clinging-aggregates are suffering.
sentences.chinese: 簡略來說，五蘊的執著是苦。

sentences.english: So it is what that drives you to move forward and to pursue the unlimited wealth with unremitting efforts?
sentences.chinese: 是什麼促使您執著向前，去爭得明擺著花不完的財富？

sentences.english: They are more inclined to blow away the cobwebs than my contemporaries.
sentences.chinese: 他們比我的同齡人更執著於去呼出自己的聲音。

sentences.english: Our Mind is primordially free and unstained, suffering only arises when there is attachment.
sentences.chinese: 心本身事實上是自由的，因爲執著而有痛苦。

sentences.english: Any marriage where one partner is selfish or self-centred is not fulfilling the pattern of Christian marriage.
sentences.chinese: 任何一方若是執著自我，就很難建立基督徒的家庭。

sentences.english: No matter happy or not, all want to bear oneself to persist at the beginning and hazily .
sentences.chinese: 無論幸福與否，都要承受自己當初朦朧的執著。

sentences.english: He showed similar adroitness and persistence in strategic arm control .
sentences.chinese: 在戰略武器方面，他顯示出了同樣的機敏和執著。

sentences.english: This single-mindedness seems to leave little room for romance or procreation.
sentences.chinese: 這種執著似乎也把戀愛生子打入了冷宮。

sentences.english: It is the best weapon for cutting the selfish knot of miserliness .
sentences.chinese: 彼亦爲斷除慳貪執著之最勝武器。

sentences.english: Maybe Remi's persistent has moved the God.
sentences.chinese: 也許是小米的執著感動了上帝。

sentences.english: Faint heart never won fair lady - and assiduous devotion helps.
sentences.chinese: 脆弱的心永遠不會贏得美人，赤城的執著纔可以。

sentences.english: People suffer because they are caught in their views.
sentences.chinese: 人們痛苦，因爲人們執著於自己的觀念。

sentences.english: Realization is possible through equanimity and non-attachment.
sentences.chinese: 證悟只有通過平靜和無執著纔可獲得。

definition: immediately/at once/at that moment/at the moment
attitude (of the heart)/state of one's psyche/way of thinking/mentality
